item.title: The Colours of Butterflies
item.description: I was working on a more complicated post about timetable data formats, but I’ve parked it for now because the child needed to be taken out to the woods to play. As we were watching the clouds of billions of tiny flies lit up by the setting sun and pretending to be galaxies I asked what I should write about instead. They said “Butterflies”. So here is a short post about butterflies.
